Descendants of Thomas HENDERSON Jr.

  • Information on the family below begins in Fairfax [now Loudoun] VA in 1755 and follows to Pittlsyvania, VA in the 1760's and 70's. By the late 1770's they are in Wilkes, NC. By 1786 the family is in Laurens, SC. Thomas Henderson d in 1806 in Laurens and Frances d in 1811 in Luarens, SC
  • Books available on the Henderson family from me or from Dr Horace Loftin of the Henderson Clan are:
  • 1. Our House of Henderson - Bob's specific Henderson Line $32.95
  • State Census Books on Hendersons
  • 2. AR 1850 28 pp includes 303 Hendersons $10
  • 3. AL 1850 43 pp includes 795 Hendersons $9.00
  • 4. AL 1860 about 50 pp includes 935 Hendersons $tbd
  • 5. FL 1850,60,70 32 pp includes 507 Hendersons (some duplication due to 3 decades) $10
  • 6. GA 1850,60,70 253 pp includes 2,879 Hendersons (some duplication due to 3 decades) $27
  • 7. KY 1850 50 pp includes 897 Hendersons $12
  • 8. LA 1850 25 pp includes 272 Hendersons $tbd
  • 9. MS 1850 32 pp includes 551 Hendersons $8
  • 10 NC 1850,60,70 150 pp (separate index) 2,473 Hendersons (some duplication - 3 decades) $17
  • 11 TN 1850 65+ pp includes 1,138 Hendersons $tbd
  • 12 OR & WA 1850,60,70 263 Hendersons included 19 pp. $tbd
  • 13 SC 1850,60,70 186 pp includes 1510 Hendersons (some duplication - 3 decades) $20
  • 14. TX 1850 20 pp includes 209 Hendersons $12
  • 15 TX 1860 46 pp includes 620 Hendersons $14
  • 15 VA 1850 62 pp (includes WV to be area) includes 918 Hendersons $13
  • Others to be ready shortly: CT 1850-70; MA 1850-70; RI 1850 & 60; PA 1850
  • Dr Horace Loftin, Clan Henderson Society, 218 Greenwood Dr Panama City, FL 32407
